data.eml:eml: Hemiodus jatuarana, a new species of Hemiodontidae from the rio Trombetas, Amazon Basin, Brazil (Teleostei, Characiformes).

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Francisco Langeani (2004): Hemiodus jatuarana, a new species of Hemiodontidae from the rio Trombetas, Amazon Basin, Brazil (Teleostei, Characiformes). Zootaxa 546: 1-6, URL: http://www.zoobank.org/urn:lsid:zoobank.org:pub:60A10A64-0A1A-4F3D-96E2-FE01E90258B9
